disclaimer: All data used in this project comes from Czech Hydrometeorological Institute. They are open data and usable by law 123/1998 Sb. with this <ref>license</ref>. Also this project is not sponsored by Czech Hydrometeorological Institute or supported in any way. This project just uses their open data.
scaleHelp: Press <icon /> to select at what scale (country, region, station) the data will be displayed.
sourceHelp: Press <icon /> to select the data source from which to display.
dateRangeHelp: Press <icon /> to select the date range and scale (annual, monthly, daily).
graphTypeHelp: Press <icon /> to select what type of data you want to display.
compareHelp: Press <icon /> to switch to comparison mode.
showButtonHelp: Press Show Graphs to display graphs with selected options.
comparisonNoteHelp: * In comparison mode, data from selected sources will be combined. Use this mode only to compare data between categories.
nothingToShow: There are no data to show.
bigDateDifference: Big difference in years. Maximal allowed difference is 5 years for daily and 25 for monthly statistics.
